name: Scalp City
description:
My first Unity solo project using simple Coroutines and UI elements.
It's a simple, one-level, minimalistic arcade platformer prototype.

In Scalp City, you can scalp cubes by shooting at them. Collect the Scalps and other powerups. You are ranked at the end based on your scalping skills.

You can download a PC or Mac build below.
Feel free to comment!
